table.SQL_SELECT_LIST: set nocount on declare @totalItem int, @totalPage int set @totalItem = ( select count(0) from WCMS_Customer where { Customer_ID @Search:Customer_ID and } { Customer_Email @Search:Customer_Email and } { Customer_FullName @Search:Customer_FullName and } { Customer_Phone @Search:Customer_Phone and } { Customer_Address @Search:Customer_Address and } 1 = 1 ) if (@pageSize < 1) set @pageSize = 10 set @totalPage = ceiling(@totalItem * 1.0 / @pageSize) if (@pageIndex < 1) set @pageIndex = 1 if (@pageIndex > @totalPage) set @pageIndex = @totalPage select Customer_ID ,Customer_Code ,(case when Customer_A = 0 then '' + Customer_FullName + '' else Customer_FullName end) as Customer_FullName ,Customer_Phone ,Customer_Email ,Customer_Address ,Customer_Level ,case when Customer_A = 1 then 'checked' else '' end as Customer_A ,0 as locked from ( select top (@pageIndex * @pageSize) ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY {@Sort} {@Asc}) as num ,Customer_ID ,Customer_FullName ,Customer_Code ,Customer_Phone ,Customer_Email ,Customer_Address ,Customer_Level ,Customer_A from WCMS_Customer where { Customer_ID @Search:Customer_ID and } { Customer_Email @Search:Customer_Email and } { Customer_FullName @Search:Customer_FullName and } { Customer_Phone @Search:Customer_Phone and } { Customer_Address @Search:Customer_Address and } 1 = 1 ) tb where [num] between (@pageIndex - 1 ) * @pageSize + 1 and @pageIndex * @pageSize select @totalItem, @pageSize, @pageIndex
table.SQL_LOAD_EDIT: set nocount on select Customer_ID ,Customer_UName ,Customer_FullName ,Customer_Email ,Customer_A ,Customer_Company ,Customer_Address ,Customer_Phone ,Customer_Date ,Customer_Code ,Customer_ParentCode ,Customer_BankAccountName ,Customer_BankAccountNumber ,Customer_Bank ,Customer_Birthday ,Customer_CMNDNumber ,Customer_CMNDDate ,Customer_CMNDPlace ,Customer_StateID ,Customer_QuanHuyen from WCMS_Customer where Customer_ID = @editID
table.SQL_UPDATE_ACTIVE: update WCMS_Customer set [Customer_A]= @active, [Customer_Date] = getutcdate() where Customer_ID = @editID select @editID
table.SQL_DELETE:
delete WCMS_Customer where Customer_ID = @delID select @@ROWCOUNT
if (@logAcc > 0) Insert into wcms_Log(Log_DateTime, Log_Action, Log_Do, Log_Table, Log_ItemID, Log_AccountID) values(getutcdate(), 'log_delete', '(' + @logIP + ') Deleted 1 Customer.', 'Customer', @delID, @logAcc)
